message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you, and I'm happy to discuss a price that works for both of us. To start, I propose a price of $14,000. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. I am willing to pay up to $12,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
